title: The Brilliant Darkness
alternative_title: Brilliant Darkness ; Fulgent Darkness ; The Brilliant Darkness ; 찬란한 어둠
status: Brilliant Darkness ; Fulgent Darkness ; The Brilliant Darkness ; 찬란한 어둠
description:
Description :
        Jeong Nan-woo made a name for himself in the world as a genius violinist after overcoming his unfortunate upbringing. He has a hard time because he cannot escape the layers of inner darkness. Enoch Milligan, known as a Hollywood handsome actor and playboy. He is struggling to get rid of the evaluation that he lacks acting skills other than an attractive face. A movie proposal modeled after Nanwoo is placed between two people who seem to have no contact. Enoch begins to stay by Nanwoo's side and observe whether he is uncomfortable or not, saying that he will take on the main character and show his acting skills.
